title: Allows the second chance commission upon application to order upon termination of criminal action by conviction for certain offenses the sealing of all official records
summary: Allows the court upon application to order upon termination of criminal action by conviction for certain offenses the sealing of all official records and papers; further provides that this act shall be known as the "second chance program".
actClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the sealing of certain criminal records
